channel.title: Tech Stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Stocks on FinanClub

item.title: CRM
item.description: score:162 Chances: Shares in enterprise software maker Salesforce rose amid an upgrade from Baird, which expects upside for CRM stock from price increases. For the most part, analysts are optimistic about Salesforce’s growth prospects in 2024. Amazon partners with Salesforce to integrate Buy with Prime into the latter’s Commerce Cloud platform.

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:34 Chances: Oracle Corp recently announced a dividend of $0.4 per share, payable on 2024-01-25, with the ex-dividend date set for 2024-01-10. The company has been named a leader in The Forrester Wave™: Retail Planning Platforms, Q4 2023, indicating its strong position in the retail planning space.
